title.rendered: “IDF Continues Counter-Terror Operations: Weapon Warehouses and Terror Cells Targeted in Khan Yunis & Al Aml Sectors”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

98th Division continues fighting in Al Aml and the Pavements sectors in Khan Yunis; IDF forces are locating and destroying weapons and terror infrastructures in the Gaza Strip

Combat team fighters of the 7th Brigade have located numerous weapons in the Khan Yunis sector.
As part of the operation, the Air Force aircraft and Engineering Corps attacked and destroyed terror infrastructures and weapons warehouses in the sector.

As part of the combat team operation of the Commando Brigade in the Al Aml sector, the fighters eliminated and arrested a number of terrorists; in addition, an aircraft attacked and killed a terrorist in the sector.
During a raid on terror infrastructures in the neighborhood, the fighters located numerous weapons including firearms, explosives, and grenades.

Combat team fighters of the Givati Brigade eliminated a terrorist cell in the Al Aml neighborhood in close combat, using short-range shooting and tank fire.

In the last day, combat aircraft of the Air Force attacked several booby-trapped buildings and offensive tunnels.
In addition, aircraft attacked dozens of terror infrastructures including weapon warehouses, launch sites, and military buildings.

Attached are pictures from the forces’ activity in the Gaza Strip: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC030420243218452

Attached is footage from the attacks in the Strip: https://bit.ly/3PMxwJK
